feels.name: Humiliation
feels.quote: His heart sank again at this sign that he could get no grasp over the wretched manâ€™s mind, and that no word of Raffles could be trusted as to the fact which he most wanted to know.

feels.name: Fear
feels.quote: He had almost immediately mounted his horse and set off for Stone Court, being anxious to arrive there before Lydgate.

causedByEvent.name: Anxiety about the situation with Raffles

feels.name: Relief
feels.quote: It seemed to him a sort of earnest that Providence intended his rescue from worse consequences; the way being thus left open for the hope of secrecy.

feels.name: Pity
feels.quote: Caleb felt a deep pity for him, but he could have used no pretexts to account for his resolve, even if they would have been of any use.

feels.name: Resignation
feels.quote: I must beg you to seek another agent.

causedByEvent.name: Decision to give up the connection with Bulstrode

feels.name: Bitterness
feels.quote: This streak of bitterness came from a plenteous source, and kept widening in the current of his thought as he neared Lowick Gate.

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: He got down from his horse in a very sad mood, and went into the house, not expecting to be cheered except by his dinner.

causedByEvent.name: Anticipation of delivering bad news to Rosamond
